projects.title: Live Chat
projects.description: This is a real time chat application made using mern stack, and used axios for connecting frontend with backend.

projects.title: MBA Chaiwala Clone
projects.description: This is the clone of MBA chaiwala website same animated cursor and animations using react on frontend and sass for styling.

projects.title: VIDEO HUB
projects.description: This is the multipage react website made using chakra ui and react router dom with dual theme support.

projects.title: XCrypto
projects.description: This is the react app in which showing real time data of crypto coming from api in three different currencies, made using chakra ui, sass, chart js and react chartjs.

projects.title: REACT CART
projects.description: This is a shopping cart app where you can add items to cart, update it or delete from cart all this with real time data change, used redux & toolkit for state management.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: The place where you get to know about me and my works, and also you can contact with me.

projects.title: YOR Chat
projects.description: This is react chat app made using chakra ui on frontend, firebase backend as a service and google authantication for login & sing-up.

projects.title: TECHY HUB
projects.description: This is a frontend of software consultancy company website made using react on frontend, sass for styling and react responsive carousel.
